data.name: Blacklight: Retribution - Onslaught Silver Pack
data.detailed_description:
Get immediate, permanent access to all receivers, gear, and tactical gear.

Players can embrace the variety of Blacklight: Retribution faster than ever before with this pack containing permanent versions of all receivers, gear, and tactical gear. This pack is a limited time offer, so act fast if you want unlimited access to the following items:

  • All primary and secondary receivers that have been released in the up to now. If you’ve been eyeing that new weapon, now is your chance to pick them all up!
  • If you want permanent access to the most game-changing items, this is the pack for you. Gain all released Tactical Gear to use anytime, including the revival injector, elemental protection gear, and several items to fool your enemies into thinking you’re somewhere else.
  • All released Gear items. Find your perfect loadout for maximum damage, or equip yourself to support your team. The choice will be yours, and with all these items you can always change your mind!

data.short_description: Get immediate, permanent access to all receivers, gear, and tactical gear.Players can embrace the variety of Blacklight: Retribution faster than ever before with this pack containing permanent versions of all receivers, gear, and tactical gear.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows® XP / Vista / Windows 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor:Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:256MB DX9 GPU (Geforce 8xxx or Radeon HD2xxx)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor:Quad-Core CPU
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:1GB+ DX11 GPU
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
